description: My name is Sonic! I love to run fast and explore the world with my friends!
I have always been chosen to be the hero to save the world but sometimes I just want to relax. I like to take naps and eat great food my grandma makes me.
Though I may not show emotion as well as everyone else does not mean I do not care about my team. I believe that anyone who abandons a teammate is worse than scum. And I love reading love books.
